name: nbaplayercomparer
description: Application that compares two or more NBA players' statistics

scripts.dev: set NODE_ENV=development && concurrently "cd nba-player-comparer-client && npm start" "nodemon server.js"
scripts.heroku-postbuild: NPM_CONFIG_PRODUCTION=false npm install --prefix nba-player-comparer-client && npm run build --prefix nba-player-comparer-client

author: Ben Freudman
